fields.name: Andrasta
fields.ability: Add [Device] slot.

fields.name: Black One
fields.ability: After you perform a [Slam] action, lose 1 [Charge]. Then, you may gain 1 ion token to remove 1 disarm token. If your [Charge] is inactive, you cannot perform the [Slam] action.

fields.name: Dauntless
fields.ability: After you partially execute a maneuver, you may perform 1 white action, treating that action as red.

fields.name: Ghost
fields.ability: You can dock 1 attack shuttle or Sheathipede-class shuttle. Your docked ships can deploy only from your rear guides.

fields.name: Havoc
fields.ability: Remove [Crew] slot. Add [Sensor] and [Astromech] slots.

fields.name: Hound's Tooth
fields.ability: 1 Z-95 AF4 headhunter can dock with you.

fields.name: IG-2000
fields.ability: You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the IG-2000 upgrade.

fields.name: Lando's Millennium Falcon
fields.ability: 1 Escape Craft may dock with you. While you have an Escape Craft docked, you may spend its shields as if they were on your ship card. While you perform a primary attack against a stressed ship, roll 1 additional attack die.

fields.name: Marauder
fields.ability: While you perform a primary [Rear Arc] attack,, you may reroll 1 attack die. Add [Gunner] slot.

fields.name: Millennium Falcon
fields.ability: While you defend, if you are evading, you may reroll 1 defense die.

fields.name: Mist Hunter
fields.ability: Add [Cannon] slot.

fields.name: Moldy Crow
fields.ability: Gain a [Front Arc] primary weapon with a value of "3." During the End Phase, do not remove up to 2 focus tokens.

fields.name: Outrider
fields.ability: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die. After you fully execute a maneuver, if you moved through or overlapped an obstacle, you may remove 1 of your red or orange tokens.

fields.name: Phantom
fields.ability: You can dock at range 0-1.

fields.name: Punishing One
fields.ability: When you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your [Front Arc], roll 1 additional attack die. Remove [Crew] slot. Add [Astromech] slot.

fields.name: ST-321
fields.ability: After you perform a [Coordinate] action, you may choose an enemy ship at range 0-3 of the ship you coordinated. If you do, acquire a lock on that enemy ship, ignoring range restrictions.

fields.name: Shadow Caster
fields.ability: After you perform an attack that hits, if the defender is in your [Single Turret Arc] and your [Front Arc], the defender gains 1 tractor token.

fields.name: Slave I
fields.ability: After you reveal a turn, ([Turn Left] or [Turn Right]) or bank ([Bank Left] or [Bank Right]) maneuver, you may set your dial to the maneuver of the same speed and bearing in the other direction. Add [Torpedo] slot.

fields.name: Virago
fields.ability: During the End Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a red [Boost] action. Add [Modification] slot.

fields.name: Rey's Millennium Falcon
fields.ability: If you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can execute red Segnor's Loop [[Segnor's Loop Left] or [Segnor's Loop Right]] maneuvers and perform [Boost] and [Rotate Arc] actions even while stressed.

fields.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
fields.ability: Attack: After the Modify Attack Dice step, change all [Critical Hit] results to [Hit] results.

fields.name: Ion Cannon
fields.ability: Attack: If this attack hits, spend 1 [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result to cause the defender to suffer 1 [Hit] damage. All remaining [Hit]/[Critical Hit] results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

fields.name: Jamming Beam
fields.ability: Attack: If this attack hits, all [Hit]/[Critical Hit] results inflict jam tokens instead of damage.

fields.name: Tractor Beam
fields.ability: Attack: If this attack hits, all [Hit]/[Critical Hit] results inflict tractor tokens instead of damage.

fields.name: Cloaking Device
fields.ability: Action: Spend 1 [Charge] to perform a [Cloak] action. At the start of the Planning Phase, roll 1 attack die. On a [Focus] result, decloak or discard your cloak token.

fields.name: Contraband Cybernetics
fields.ability: Before you activate, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, until the end of the round, you can perform actions and execute red maneuvers, even while stressed.

fields.name: Deadman's Switch
fields.ability: After you are destroyed, each other ship at range 0-1 suffers 1 [Hit] damage.

fields.name: Feedback Array
fields.ability: Before you engage, you may gain 1 ion token and 1 disarm token. If you do, each ship at range 0 suffers 1 [Hit] damage.

fields.name: Inertial Dampeners
fields.ability: Before you would execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 shield. If you do, execute a white [0 [Stationary]] instead of the maneuver you revealed, then gain 1 stress token.

fields.name: Rigged Cargo Chute
fields.ability: Action: Spend 1 [Charge]. Drop 1 loose cargo using the [1 [Straight]] template.

fields.name: Composure
fields.ability: After you fail an action, if you have no green tokens, you may perform a [Focus] action.

fields.name: Crack Shot
fields.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1 [Charge] to cancel 1 [Evade] result.

fields.name: Daredevil
fields.ability: While you perform a white [Boost] action, you may treat it as red to use the [1 [Turn Left]] or [1 [Turn Right]] template instead.

fields.name: Debris Gambit
fields.ability: While you perform a red [Evade] action, if there is an obstacle at range 0-1, treat the action as white instead.

fields.name: Elusive
fields.ability: While you defend, you may spend 1 [Charge] to reroll 1 defense die. After you fully execute a red maneuver, recover 1 [Charge].

fields.name: Fanatical
fields.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if you are not shielded, you may change 1 [Focus] result to a [Hit] result.

fields.name: Fearless
fields.ability: While you perform a [Front Arc] primary attack, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the defender's [Front Arc], you may change 1 of your results to a [Hit] result.

fields.name: Heroic
fields.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if you have only blank results and have 2 or more results, you may reroll any number of your dice.

fields.name: Intimidation
fields.ability: While an enemy ship at range 0 defends, it rolls 1 fewer defense die.

fields.name: Juke
fields.ability: While you perform an attack, if you are evading, you may change 1 of the defender's [Evade] results to a [Focus] result.

fields.name: Lone Wolf
fields.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0-2, you may spend 1 [Charge] to reroll 1 of your dice.

fields.name: Marksmanship
fields.ability: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], you may change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

fields.name: Outmaneuver
fields.ability: While you perform a [Front Arc] arrack, if you are not in the defender's firing arc, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

fields.name: Predator
fields.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], you may reroll 1 attack die.

fields.name: Ruthless
fields.ability: While you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender. If you do, that ship suffers 1 [Hit] damage and you may change 1 of your die results to a [Hit] result.

fields.name: Saturation Salvo
fields.ability: While you perform a [Torpedo] or [Missile] attack, you may spend 1 charge from that upgrade. If you do, choose two defence dice. The defender must reroll those dice.

fields.name: Selfless
fields.ability: While another friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, before the Neutralize Results step, if you are in the attack arc, you may suffer 1 [Critical Hit] damage to cancel 1 [Critical Hit] result.

fields.name: Squad Leader
fields.ability: While you coordinate, the ship you choose can perform an action only if that action is also on your action bar.

fields.name: Swarm Tactics
fields.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

fields.name: Trick Shot
fields.ability: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, roll 1 additional attack die.

fields.name: Ablative Plating
fields.ability: Before you would suffer damage from an obstacle or from a friendly bomb detonating, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, prevent 1 damage.

fields.name: Advanced SLAM
fields.ability: After you perform a [Slam] action, if you fully executed that maneuver, you may perform a white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

fields.name: Afterburners
fields.ability: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a [Boost] action, even while stressed.

fields.name: Electronic Baffle
fields.ability: During the End Phase, you may suffer 1 [Hit] damage to remove 1 red token.

fields.name: Munitions Failsafe
fields.ability: While you perform a [Torpedo] or [Missile] attack, after rolling attack dice, you may cancel all dice results to recover 1 [Charge] you spent as a cost for the attack.

fields.name: Static Discharge Vanes
fields.ability: Before you would gain 1 ion or jam token, if you are not stressed, you may choose another ship at range 0-1 and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the chosen ship gains that ion or jam token instead.

fields.name: Stealth Device
fields.ability: While you defend, if your [Charge] is active, roll 1 additional defense die. After you suffer damage, lose 1 [Charge].

fields.name: Tactical Scrambler
fields.ability: While you obstruct an enemy ship's attack, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

fields.name: "Chopper"
fields.ability: Action: Spend 1 non-recurring [Charge] from another equipped upgrade to recover 1 shield. Action: Spend 2 shields to recover 1 non-recurring [Charge] on an equipped upgrade.

fields.name: "Genius"
fields.ability: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you have not dropped or launched a device this round, you may drop 1 bomb.

fields.name: R2 Astromech
fields.ability: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1 [Charge] and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

fields.name: R2-D2
fields.ability: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1 [Charge] and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

fields.name: R3 Astromech
fields.ability: You can maintain up to 2 locks. Each lock must be on a different object. After you perform a [Lock] action, you may acquire a lock.

fields.name: R4 Astromech
fields.ability: Decrease the difficulty of your speed 1-2 basic maneuvers ([Turn Left], [Bank Left], [Straight], [Bank Right], [Turn Right]).

fields.name: R5 Astromech
fields.ability: Action: Spend 1 [Charge] to repair 1 facedown damage card. Action: Repair 1 faceup Ship damage card.

fields.name: R5-D8
fields.ability: Action: Spend 1 [Charge] to repair 1 facedown damage card. Action: Repair 1 faceup Ship damage card.

fields.name: R5-P8
fields.ability: While you perform an attack against a defender in your [Front Arc], you may spend 1 [Charge] to reroll 1 attack die. If the rerolled result is a [Critical Hit], suffer 1 [Critical Hit] damage.

fields.name: R5-TK
fields.ability: You can perform attacks against friendly ships.

fields.name: R5-X3
fields.ability: Before you activate or engage, you may spend 1 [Charge] to ignore obstacles until the end of this phase.

fields.name: R2-HA
fields.ability: While you defend, you may spend your lock on the attacker to reroll any number of your defense dice.

fields.name: BB-8
fields.ability: Before you execute a blue maneuver, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action.

fields.name: BB Astromech
fields.ability: Before you execute a blue maneuver, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a [Barrel Roll].

fields.name: M9-G8
fields.ability: While a ship you are locking performs an attack, you may choose 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker rerolls that die.

fields.name: "Chopper"
fields.ability: During the Perform Action step, you may perform 1 action, even while stressed. After you perform an action while stressed, suffer 1 [Hit] damage unless you expose 1 of your damage cards.

fields.name: "Zeb" Orrelios
fields.ability: You can perform primary attacks at range 0. Enemy ships at range 0 can perform primary attacks against you.
At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 0-1. If you do, you gain 1 calculate token unless that ship chooses to gain 1 stress token.

fields.name: 4-LOM
fields.ability: While you perform an attack, after rolling attack dice, you may name a type of green token. If you do, gain 2 ion tokens and, during this attack, the defender cannot spend tokens of the named type.

fields.name: Admiral Sloane
fields.ability: After another friendly ship at range 0-3 defends, if it is destroyed, the attacker gains 2 stress tokens. While a friendly ship at range 0-3 performs an attack against a stressed ship, it may reroll 1 attack die.

fields.name: Agent Kallus
fields.ability: Setup: Assign the Hunted condition to 1 enemy ship. While you perform an attack against the ship with the Hunted condition, you may change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Hit] result.

fields.name: Baze Malbus
fields.ability: While you perform a [Focus] action, you may treat it as red. If you do, gain 1 additional focus token for each enemy ship at range 0-1 to a maximum of 2.

fields.name: Boba Fett
fields.ability: Setup: Start in reserve. At the end of Setup, place yourself at range 0 of an obstacle and beyond range 3 of an enemy ship.

fields.name: C-3PO
fields.ability: Before rolling defense dice, you may spend 1 calculate token to guess aloud a number 1 or higher. If you do, and you roll exactly that many [Evade] results, add 1 [Evade] result. Adter you perform the [Calculate] action, gain 1 calculate token.

fields.name: Cad Bane
fields.ability: After you drop or launch a device, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

fields.name: Captain Phasma
fields.ability: At the end of the Engagement Phase, each enemy ship at range 0-1 that is not stressed gains 1 stress token.

fields.name: Cassian Andor
fields.ability: During the System Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 1-2 and guess aloud a bearing and speed, then look at that ship's dial. If the chosen ship's bearing and speed match your guess, you may set your dial to another maneuver.

fields.name: Chewbacca
fields.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 2 [Charge] to repair 1 faceup damage card.

fields.name: Chewbacca
fields.ability: At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 1 focus token to repair 1 of your faceup damage cards.

fields.name: Ciena Ree
fields.ability: After you perform a [Coordinate] action, if the ship you coordinated performed a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, it may gain 1 stress token to rotate 90˚.

fields.name: Cikatro Vizago
fields.ability: During the End Phase, you may choose 2 [Illicit] upgrades equipped to friendly ships at range 0-1. If you do, you may exchange these upgrades. End of Game: Return all [Illicit] upgrades to their original ships.

fields.name: Darth Vader
fields.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in your firing arc at range 0-2 and spend 1 [Force]. If you do, that ship suffers 1 [Hit] damage unless it chooses to remove 1 green token.

fields.name: Death Troopers
fields.ability: During the Activation Phase, enemy ships at range 0-1 cannot remove stress tokens.

fields.name: Director Krennic
fields.ability: Setup: Before placing forces, assign the Optimized Prototype condition to another friendly ship.

fields.name: Emperor Palpatine
fields.ability: While another friendly ship defends or performs an attack, you may spend 1 [Force] to modify 1 of its dice as though that ship had spent 1 [Force].

fields.name: Freelance Slicer
fields.ability: While you defend, before attack dice are rolled, you may spend a lock you have on the attacker to roll 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker gains 1 [Jam] token. Then, on a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, gain 1 [Jam] token.

fields.name: General Hux
fields.ability: While you perform a white [Coordinate] action, you may treat if as red. If you do, you may coordinate up to 2 additional ships of the same ship type, and each ship you coordinate must perform the same action, treating that action as red.

fields.name: GNK "Gonk" Droid
fields.ability: Setup: Lose 1 [Charge]. Action: Recover 1 [Charge]. Action: Spend 1 [Charge] to recover 1 shield.

fields.name: Grand Inquisitor
fields.ability: After an enemy ship at range 0-2 reveals its dial, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform 1 white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

fields.name: Grand Moff Tarkin
fields.ability: During the System Phase, you may spend 2 [Charge]. If you do, each friendly ship may acquire a lock on a ship that you have locked.

fields.name: Hera Syndulla
fields.ability: You can execute red maneuvers even while stressed. After you fully execute a red maneuver, if you ahve 3 or more stress tokens, remove 1 stress token and suffer 1 [Hit] damage.

fields.name: IG-88D
fields.ability: You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the IG-2000 upgrade. After you perform a [Calculate] action, gain 1 calculate token.

fields.name: ISB Slicer
fields.ability: During the End Phase, enemy ships at range 1-2 cannot remove jam tokens.

fields.name: Informant
fields.ability: Setup: After placing forces, choose 1 enemy ship and assign the Listening Device condition to it.

fields.name: Jabba the Hutt
fields.ability: During the End Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 0-2 and spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, that ship recovers 1 [Charge] on 1 of its equipped [Illicit] upgrades.

fields.name: Jyn Erso
fields.ability: If a friendly ship at range 0-3 would gain a focus token, it may gain 1 evade token instead.

fields.name: Kanan Jarrus
fields.ability: After a friendly ship at range 0-2 fully executes a white maneuver, you may spend 1 [Force] to remove 1 stress token from that ship.

fields.name: Ketsu Onyo
fields.ability: At the start of the End Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 0-2 in your firing arc. If you do, that ship does not remove its tractor tokens.

fields.name: Kylo Ren
fields.ability: Action: Choose 1 enemy ship at range 1-3. If you do, spend 1 [Force] to assign the I'll Show You the Dark Side condition to that ship.

fields.name: L3-37
fields.ability: Setup: Equip this side faceup. While you defend, you may flip this card. If you do, the attack must reroll all attack dice.
fields.ability2: If you are not shielded, decrease the difficulty of your bank ([Bank Left] and [Bank Right]) maneuvers.

fields.name: Lando Calrissian
fields.ability: After you roll dice, you may spend 1 green token to reroll up to 2 of your results.

fields.name: Lando Calrissian
fields.ability: Action: Roll 2 defense dice. For each [Focus] result, gain 1 focus token. For each [Evade] result, gain 1 evade token. If both results are blank, the opposing player chooses focus or evade. You gain 1 token of that type.

fields.name: Latts Razzi
fields.ability: While you defend, if the attacker is stressed, you may remove 1 stress from the attacker to change 1 of your blank/[Focus] results to an [Evade] result.

fields.name: Leia Organa
fields.ability: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 3 [Charge]. During this phase, each friendly ship reduces the difficulty of its red maneuvers.

fields.name: Magva Yarro
fields.ability: After you defend, if the attack hit, you may acquire a lock on the attacker.

fields.name: Maul
fields.ability: After you suffer damage, you may gain 1 stress token to recover 1 [Force]. You can equip "Dark Side" upgades.

fields.name: Minister Tua
fields.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if you are damaged, you may perform a red [Reinforce] action.

fields.name: Moff Jerjerrod
fields.ability: During the System Phase, you may spend 2 [Charge]. If you do, choose the [1 [Bank Left]], [1 [Straight]], or [1 [Bank Right]] template. Each friendly ship may perform a red [Boost] action using that template.

fields.name: Nien Nunb
fields.ability: Decrease the difficulty of your bank maneuvers [[Bank Left] and [Bank Right]].

fields.name: Novice Technician
fields.ability: At the end of the round, you may roll 1 attack die to repair 1 faceup damage card. Then, on a [Hit] result, expose 1 damage card.

fields.name: Perceptive Copilot
fields.ability: After you perform a [Focus] action, gain 1 focus token.

fields.name: Petty Officer Thanisson
fields.ability: During the Activation or Engagement Phase, after an enemy ship in your [Front Arc] at range 0-1 gains a red or orange token, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token. If you do, that ship gains 1 additional token of the type that it gained.

fields.name: Qi'ra
fields.ability: While you move and perform attacks, you ignore all obstacles that you are locking.

fields.name: R2-D2
fields.ability: During the End Phase, if you are damaged and not shielded, you may roll 1 attack die to recover 1 shield. On a [Hit] result, expose 1 of your damage cards.

fields.name: Sabine Wren
fields.ability: Setup: Place 1 ion, 1 jam, 1 stress, and 1 tractor token on this card. After a ship suffers the effect of a friendly bomb, you may remove 1 ion, jam, stress, or tractor token from this card. If you do, that ship gains a matching token.

fields.name: Saw Gerrera
fields.ability: While you perform an attack, you may suffer 1 [Hit] damage to change all of your [Focus] results to [Critical Hit] results.

fields.name: Seasoned Navigator
fields.ability: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to another non-red maneuver of the same speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.

fields.name: Seventh Sister
fields.ability: If an enemy ship at range 0-1 would gain a stress token, you may spend 1 [Force] to have it gain 1 jam or tractor token instead.

fields.name: Supreme Leader Snoke
fields.ability: During the System Phase, you may choose any number of enemy ships beyond range 1. If you do, spend that many [Force] to flip each chosen ship's dial faceup.

fields.name: Tobias Beckett
fields.ability: Setup: After placing forces, you may choose 1 obstacle in the play area. If you do, place it anywhere in the play area beyond range 2 of any board edge or ship and beyond range 1 of other obstacles.

fields.name: Unkar Plutt
fields.ability: After you partially excute a maneuver, you may suffer 1 [Hit] damage to perform 1 white action.

fields.name: Zuckuss
fields.ability: While you perform an attack, if ou are not stressed, you may choose 1 defense die and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the defender must reroll that die.

fields.name: C-3PO
fields.ability: While you coordinate, you can choose friendly ships beyond range 2 if they have [Calculate] on their action bar. After you perform the [Calculate] or [Coordinate] action, gain 1 calculate token.

fields.name: Han Solo
fields.ability: After you perform an [Evade] action, gain additional evade tokens equal to the number of enemy ships at range 0-1.

fields.name: Chewbacca
fields.ability: Setup: Lose 1 [Charge]. After a friendly ship at range 0-3 is dealt 1 damage card, recover 1 [Charge]. While you perform an attack, you may spend 2 [Charge] to change 1 [Focus] result to a [Crit] result.

fields.name: Rose Tico
fields.ability: While you defend or perform a primary attack, you may spend 1 of your results to acquire a lock on the enemy ship.
